name: Home Olympics 2020
description:
It's year 2020. Humanity faces an epidemic outbreak. This year's Olympic games are postponed for a year. While being bored on self-isolation, why not participate in your own olympics?

Explore your self-isolated house and play various olympic activities and set world records.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - move

E - interact 

Escape - menu/pause

Minigames controls:

  • Boxing:

Left Mouse button - left hook

Right Mouse button - right hook

  • Curling:

Hold or Release Left Mouse button - sweep the broom to controll cart's speed

Spacebar (once) - push a cart

  • Swimming:

Spacebar (continiously) - push swimmer forward

  • Basketball:

Aim with a mouse

Hold Left Mouse Button - to charge up a throw

Release LMB - to throw
